name: Ante'thyr
description:
Ante'thyr

Click the button to begin, the world will take a while to generate(it'll only do this once though). Holding "R" while clicking the button re-creates the world.

Ante'thyr is a virtual ecosystem that is slowly gaining content over time. You are an Ante'thyr in an inside-out planet, full of plants, wildlife(Not yet) and people(Not yet). This experience takes place in a large generated open world, plenty to explore :)

At the moment only a small amount of the eventual playable world is generated, there currently aren't any animals or people. These will come in a future update, this is a work in progress. (development discord)

Native linux build coming soonish(when I figure out how appimage works)

WASD: Move

F11: Full

ESC: Unlock Mouse
